doc.field: The Ramsey County LiDAR data set is a bare earth point data set created from a November 2001, Waggoner Engineering, LiDAR airborne survey. This data set covers Ramsey County except the City of Saint Paul who maintain their own DEM data.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata xml:lang="en"><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><title>Ramsey County LiDAR</title><origin>Ramsey County</origin><pubinfo><publish>Ramsey County</publish></pubinfo><pubdate>Periodically revised</pubdate><onlink /></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>The Ramsey County LiDAR data set is a bare earth point data set created from a November 2001, Waggoner Engineering, LiDAR airborne survey. This data set covers Ramsey County except the City of Saint Paul who maintain their own DEM data.</abstract><purpose>LiDAR points support many functions including contours, drainage, emergency management, street, road and site development plans.</purpose><supplinf>Ramsey County</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>2001</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>Data set is current</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>Irregular</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-93.234795</westbc><eastbc>-92.975142</eastbc><northbc>45.129485</northbc><southbc>44.885086</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><place><placekey>Minnesota, Ramsey County</placekey></place><theme><themekey>LiDAR, elevations, DEM, Isolines</themekey><themekt /></theme></keywords><accconst>This data set is available to everyone. Fees and policy are published in the Ramsey County Fee Schedule. Charges are variable and are subject to change. See the Ramsey County Fee Schedule for specific information on fees and policy.</accconst><useconst>COPYRIGHT NOTICE The data is Copyright © by the County of Ramsey. All rights reserved. Except as expressly provided herein, no part of this data may be copied, reproduced, sold, transferred, or transmitted in any form, or by any means, whether graphic, electronic, or mechanical, including photocopying, recording, or by an information storage or retrieval system, without express prior written permission of the County of Ramsey.</useconst><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>Curt Peterson</cntper><cntorg>Ramsey County Surveyor's Office</cntorg></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Supervisor</cntpos><cntaddr><address>1425 Paul Kirkwold Dr</address><city>Arden Hills</city><state>MN</state><postal>55112</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651-266-7172</cntvoice><cntfax>651-266-7180</cntfax><cntemail>curtis.peterson@co.ramsey.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac><browse><browsen>None available</browsen><browsed /></browse><crossref><citeinfo><title>Graphic: Contours (2' contour lines) Annotation (parcel, road and water map text) Info (landties, cartographic elements) StrCenterlines (road centerlines) Point (land ownership points) Line (land division outlines) ParComp (land division areas) Parcel (land ownership regions) PLS (Public Land Survey)
Data Sets: COREDB.DBF (CORE PARCEL ATTRIBUTE DATABASE) EPARDES.DBF (ACS PARCEL DESCRIPTION DB) ECURTAX.DBF (ACS CURRENT TAX DB) ENAMADD.DBF (ACS NAME AND ADDRESS DB) ENAMADDO.DBF (ACS NAME AND ADDRESS OTHER DB) EVALUES.DBF (ACS TAX VALUES DB) EDELTAX.DBF (ACS DELINQUENT TAX DB) ESPASMT.DBF (ACS SPECIAL ASSESSMENTS DB) ETRDETL.DBF (ACS TRANSACTION DETAIL DB) APT.DBF (ASSESSOR'S APARTMENT DESCRIPTION DB) COMMAREA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S COMMERCIAL AREA DESCRIPTION DB) COMMDATA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S COMMERCIAL BUILDING DESCRIPTION DB) DWELLDATA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S RESIDENTIAL DWELLING DESCRIPTION DB) LANDDATA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S LAND DESCRIPTION DB) PARCELDA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S PARCEL DESCRIPTION DB) PERMIT.DBF (PERMIT DB) SALES.DBF (SALES DATABASE)</title></citeinfo></crossref><native>Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.722</native></idinfo><dataqual><attracc><attraccr>The elevation attribute accuracy is based on a November, 2001 LIDAR airborne survey. The point data collected in this manner was tested to meet VMAS mapping accuracy at the 90% confidence level of 1.06 feet when compared against the final delivered DEM.</attraccr></attracc><logic>Generally linework depicted here was not originally intended to create closed boundaries or polygons.</logic><complete>Entire Ramsey County coverage except the City of Saint Paul</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>The vendor for this project (Waggoner Engineering, Inc.) states in their flight planning documentation that the horizontal accuracy of each point is 1.5 feet.</horizpar></horizpa><vertacc><vertaccr>The verticle accuracy is based on the independent collection of 199 ground surveyd points distributed throughout the project. The comparison for the surveyed determined elevation at each coordinate point and the DEM elevation for the same coordinate, the VMAS mapping accuracy at a 90% confidence level is 1.06 feet. The NSSDA mapping accuracy at a 95% confidence level is 1.20 feet.</vertaccr></vertacc></posacc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>PROCEDURE: LIDAR data set acquired in 2003
MAP SOURCE: LIDAR Points
PROJECTION: Ramsey County Coordinate System</procdesc></procstep><srcinfo><srcscale>2400</srcscale></srcinfo></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref /><direct>Point</direct><mgmg3obj>Point</mgmg3obj><mgmg3til /></spdoinfo><spref><horizsys><geograph><latres /><longres /></geograph><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>County Coordinates</gridsysn><utm><utmzone /></utm><spcs><spcszone /></spcs><mgmg4coz>43</mgmg4coz><mgmg4adj /></gridsys><mapproj><mapprojn /><mgmg4par /><otherprj /></mapproj><planci><plandu>Feet</plandu><coordrep><absres /><ordres /></coordrep></planci></planar><geodetic><ellips>GRS80</ellips><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn></geodetic></horizsys></spref><eainfo><overview><eaover>Attributes are related to the creation and digital conversion of parcel lines.</eaover><eadetcit>Entity Attributes: ObjectID Z Shape</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><distrib><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>David Wilford</cntper><cntorg>Ramsey County Surveyor's Office</cntorg></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Technician</cntpos><cntaddr><address>1425 Paul Kirkwold Dr</address><city>Arden Hills</city><state>MN</state><postal>55112</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651-266-7175</cntvoice><cntfax>651-266-7180</cntfax><cntemail>david.wilford@co.ramsey.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></distrib><resdesc>Available upon request</resdesc><distliab>DISCLAIMER EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY STATED HEREIN, THIS DATA IS PROVIDED AS IS WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. LICENSEE BEARS ANY AND ALL RISK RELATING TO QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE OF THIS DATA.
Limit on Liability This data is not a legally recorded map or survey and is not intended to be used as one. This data is a compilation of records and information from various state, county, and city offices, and other sources, and should be used for reference only.
In no event will the County of Ramsey be liable for direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of the use of, or inability to use, the data, even if advised of the possibility of such damages. The sole liability of the County of Ramsey and the licensee's exclusive remedy for any substantial defect which impairs the licensee's use of the data for purposes stated herein shall be the right to terminate this license and refund any fee paid.</distliab><stdorder><digform><digtinfo><formname>Geodatabase, Shapefile, DWG & DXF</formname><formvern>ArcGIS 9.1</formvern><transize /></digtinfo></digform><ordering>Contact distributor</ordering></stdorder></distinfo><metainfo><metd>20051003</metd><metc><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>Chris Ulrich</cntper><cntorg>Ramsey County Surveyor's Office</cntorg></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Technician</cntpos><cntaddr><address>1425 Paul Kirkwold Dr</address><city>Arden Hills</city><state>MN</state><postal>55112</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651-266-7176</cntvoice><cntfax>651-266-7680</cntfax><cntemail>christina.ulrich@co.ramsey.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></metc><metstdn>Minnesota Geographic Metadata Guidelines</metstdn><metstdv>1.2</metstdv><metextns><onlink>http://www.gis.state.mn.us/stds/metadata.htm</onlink></metextns></metainfo><Esri><ModDate>20080213</ModDate><ModTime>15054200</ModTime></Esri><mdDateSt Sync="TRUE">20080213</mdDateSt></metadata>
